doc.title: Topical event-driven situations into year-end
doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/Topical event-driven situations into year- end 年末前的热点事件驱动情境_2025-09-02

passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Equities 市场洞察 | 市场 | 股票
Sales & Analysis: Matt Michon & Hannah Taylor | Trading: Dav Bedi | Execution: Ben Stratton & Roopa Malde | Baskets : Elias Benzina
销售与分析：Matt Michon & Hannah Taylor | 交易：Dav Bedi | 执行：Ben Stratton & Roopa Malde | 篮子：Elias Benzina
All references to "we/us/our" refer to the sales desk unless specified
所有提及“我们/我方/我们的”均指销售部门，除非另有说明

Topical situations in September &amp; Q4 202505-SepOutset EGMOct/Nov·Solicitor General decision on referral of Bayer / Durnell case (Glyphosate) to SCOTUS08-SepAnnual day of BMPs' tender offer for Mediobanca03 Nov·MDL NEC trial due to start (Abbott vs. Brown) – Reckitt read-across. MJ case scheduled for February 202609-SepUnilever CMD for The Magnum Ice Cream Company06 Nov·EDP CMDMid-SepOrsted Prospectus (expected)Mid-Nov·Unilever spin-off of "The Magnum Ice Cream Company"18-SepContinental spin-off of Aumovio04-Dec·Rio Tinto CMDH2 SepOrsted rights trading period (expected)End 25·French Appeals court decision Vivendi / Bollore situation01-OctSFR restructuring effective dateQ1 2026·Ashtead relistingEnd-OctExpected merger plan approval merger BPSO / BPERQ2 2026·Wise relisting
Source: GS Event Driven desk, Goldman Sachs FICC & Equities, as of 01 September 2025

1/ Orsted rights- issue: On 11 August, Orsted announced its intention to launch a DKK 60bn rights issue (\~ \(\) 9.3bn) following difficulties in divesting a stake in its Sunrise Wind Offshore project due to a more challenging environment in the US for offshore wind projects.
1/ Orsted 配股发行：8月11日，Orsted宣布计划启动一项规模为600亿丹麦克朗（约93亿美元）的配股发行，此前由于美国海上风电项目环境更具挑战性，其在出售Sunrise Wind海上风电项目股权方面遇到困难。
The DKK 60bn capital raise compares to its current (01- Sep) market cap of DKK 84bn. 这笔600亿丹麦克朗的融资规模，与其当前（9月1日）840亿丹麦克朗的市值相比。

Orsted's #1 shareholder, the Danish state with a \(50.1\%\) stake, and Equinor, its #2 shareholder with a \(10\%\) stake, have both committed to subscribe for their pro- rata share. An EGM will take place on 05 September to approve the rights issue, the prospectus is expected in the first half of September followed by rights trading (10 business days) & the subscription period. Closing of the transaction is expected in the first half of October. To hedge: GSCMORSH Index
Orsted 的第一大股东——持股 \(50.1\%\) 的丹麦政府，以及第二大股东——持股 \(10\%\) 的Equinor，均已承诺按比例认购其应有份额。特别股东大会将于9月5日举行，以批准配股事宜，招股说明书预计将在9月上半月发布，随后进行为期10个交易日的配股权交易及认购期。该交易预计将在10月上半月完成。对冲：GSCMORSH指数

\*\* For more information, desk note (23- Aug): ORSTED rights issue (DKK60bn, \~2/3 of mkt cap). EGM 05 Sep, GIR (25- Aug): Orsted A/S (ORSTED.CO): Revolution Wind halted: Implications for Orsted, GIR (12- Aug): Is the equity raise a clearing event? Not fully...
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅桌面备忘录（8月23日）：ORSTED配股发行（600亿丹麦克朗，约占市值的2/3）。临时股东大会9月5日，GIR（8月25日）：Orsted A/S（ORSTED.CO）：Revolution Wind项目暂停：对Orsted的影响，GIR（8月12日）：增发是否为清算事件？尚不完全...

2/ Italian Banks: a/ BMPS' tender for Mediobanca is trading \(4\%\) through the terms (@ \(2.533x BMPS\) ). The tender deadline for BMPS' acquisition of Mediobanca is 08 September. The deadline for an amendment of the terms is 3- days prior to the tender deadline.
2/ 意大利银行：a/ BMPS 收购 Mediobanca 的要约交易价格比条款低 \(4\%\) (@ \(2.533x BMPS\) )。BMPS 收购 Mediobanca 的要约截止日期为9月8日。修改条款的截止日期为要约截止日期前3天。

b/ BPER Banca now owns \(80.7\%\) of Banca Popolare di Sondrio (BPSO). During the previous tender- offer, the deal terms were amended from \(1.450x BPE\) shares to \(1.450x + \epsilon 1\) on 04 July. The additional acceptance period ended 25 July. BPER's H1 results
presentation in August indicated a merger plan being approved by the end of October. BPSO shares are trading at a \(\sim 3\%\) discount to the initial all- stock terms (1.45x).

b/ BPER Banca 目前持有 Banca Popolare di Sondrio (BPSO) 80.7% 的股份。在之前的要约收购中，交易条款于 7 月 4 日从 1.450 倍 PE 股票修改为 1.450 倍 + 1 欧元。额外接受期于 7 月 25 日结束。BPER 在 8 月公布的上半年业绩报告中表示，合并计划将在 10 月底前获批。BPSO 股价目前较最初的全股票交易条款（1.45 倍）有约 3% 的折让。
\*\* For more information, desk note (07- Aug): Italian banking consolidation: Precedents & technical points on Italian M&A
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备忘（8 月 7 日）：意大利银行业整合：意大利并购的先例与技术要点

3/ Continental spin- off: On 18 September 2025, Continental will spin- off its automotive business, Aumovio, which currently represents \~half of group sales (FY24). Shareholder approval is in place. Shareholders will receive 1x Aumovio share for every 2x Continental shares they own. To hedge: GSCBCONA Index
3/ Continental 分拆：2025 年 9 月 18 日，Continental 将分拆其汽车业务 Aumovio，该业务目前约占集团销售额的一半（2024 财年）。股东批准已到位。股东每持有 2 股 Continental 股票，将获得 1 股 Aumovio 股票。对冲工具：GSCBCONA 指数
\*\* For more information, desk note (23- Aug): Continental: AUMOVIO listing 18- Sep
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备忘（8 月 23 日）：Continental: AUMOVIO 将于 9 月 18 日上市

4/ Unilever spin- off: In mid- November 2025, Unilever will spin- off its Ice Cream division, "The Magnum Ice Cream Company". TMICC is the #1 player in the sector with a \(20\%\) market share, ahead of Froneri, a JV between Nestle and PAI Partners. In FY24, the asset had €8.3bn of sales & €1.4bn of EBITDA, \(14\%\) & \(11\%\) respectively of the Unilever group. Unilever will host a CMD on 09 September. Key topics of debate on the spin- off are likely to focus on flowback dynamics (primary listing in NL), leverage, dividend policy & the appropriate peer group (no pure- play listed comps).

4/ 联合利华分拆：2025年11月中旬，联合利华将分拆其冰淇淋部门——“The Magnum Ice Cream Company”。TMICC是该行业的头号玩家，市场份额为 \(20\%\) ，领先于由雀巢和PAI Partners合资成立的Froneri。在2024财年，该资产实现销售额83亿欧元和EBITDA14亿欧元，分别占联合利华集团的 \(14\%\) 和 \(11\%\) 。联合利华将于9月9日举办资本市场日（CMD）。围绕此次分拆的主要讨论议题可能集中在回流动态（主要在荷兰上市）、杠杆率、股息政策以及合适的可比公司群体（无纯粹的上市可比公司）。
\*\* For more information, GIR note: GIR (23- July): 10 Questions on The Magnum Ice Cream Company &
\*\*欲了解更多信息，请参阅GIR备注：GIR（7月23日）：关于TheMagnumIceCream Company的10个问题&

5/ Telco 4- to- 3 consolidation: Ongoing press reports about potential 4- to- 3 consolidation in the European telecom market as Telefonica undergoes a strategic review & French operators consider a buyout of SFR following its debt- restructuring (PR, effective 01- Oct).
5/ 电信行业4合3整合：媒体持续报道欧洲电信市场可能出现4合3整合的消息，因Telefonica正在进行战略审查，且法国运营商在SFR完成债务重组后（新闻稿，自10月1日起生效）考虑收购该公司。

In a sector piece from 31- Jul, United Internet (UTDI GY) and its subsidiary 1&1 (#4 operator in Germany) screen as best placed among GIR's European telecom coverage to benefit from market consolidation with \(227\%\) & \(131\%\) upside respectively.
在7月31日的一篇行业报告中，United Internet（UTDI GY）及其子公司1&1（德国第四大运营商）在GIR覆盖的欧洲电信公司中，被认为最有可能从市场整合中受益，潜在上涨空间分别为 \(227\%\) 和 \(131\%\) 。

Given the low- liquidity of 1&1 and a recent tender from its parent entity to increase its holding to \(90\%\) , United Internet is the preferred instrument to play German 4- to- 3 consolidation. UTDI also has a \(64\%\) stake in listed IONOS ("IOS GY", €5bn mkt cap), a fibre asset (Versatel) & "consumer application" business (email, online storage,
homepage solutions). GIR's SoTP (pre- conglomerate discount) = €49.40 vs. spot €27. Alternatively, consider our 4- to- 3 basket: GSCM4TO3 Index.

鉴于1&1的流动性较低，以及其母公司近期发起的要约收购以将持股比例提高至 \(90\%\) ，United Internet是参与德国从四家运营商整合至三家的首选工具。UTDI还持有上市公司IONOS（“IOSGY”，市值50亿欧元） \(64\%\) 的股份，以及光纤资产（Versatel）和“消费者应用”业务（电子邮件、在线存储、主页解决方案）。GIR的分部加总估值（未计入企业集团折扣）为49.40欧元，而当前股价为27欧元。另一种选择是考虑我们的4- to- 3投资组合：GSCM4TO3指数。
Source: GS Event Driven desk, Goldman Sachs FICC & Equities, as of 30 Jan 2025 - GIR note: Digital Infrastructure: Deregulation, ramping returns & bifurcation offer further compelling opportunities

\*\* For more information, desk note (10- Feb): European Telco consolidation | First moves....GIR: (31- Jul): Mobile consolidation: Analysing the upside from the next phase of Digital Infrastructure deregulation, (14- Jul): Material inorganic upside potential at United Internet and 1&1, (05- Jun): Telefonica - Analysing Strategic Review 'decision tree' explains investor uncertainty but highlights upside potential, GIR (14- May): Telecom Services: Telefonica // Liberty Global: Press reports around TEF potentially buying the rest of VMO2, Webcast reply

\*\* 更多信息，请参阅桌面备忘（2月10日）：欧洲电信公司整合|初步行动.....GIR（7月31日）：移动通信整合：分析数字基础设施下一阶段放松管制带来的上行空间，（7月14日）：United Internet和1&1存在显著的非有机增长潜力，（6月5日）：Telefonica- 分析战略评估“决策树”，解释了投资者的不确定性，但也突出了上行潜力，GIR（5月14日）：电信服务：Telefonica // Liberty Global：媒体报道TEF可能收购VMO2剩余股份，网络直播回复

6/EDP CMD: 06 Nov CMD to unveil new group strategy. EDP has consistently underperformed peers' share- price performance given lack of earnings growth since 2010 & two equity raises (2020, 2023). GIR discuss several levers that could be pulled:

pivot away from low- multiple regions, share- buyback at EDPR, capex discipline & higher- return targets. In the past there has also been talk about a simplification of the group (EDPR / EDP merger) & press- reports about Naturgy strategic interest.

6/ EDP CMD: 11 月 6 日资本市场日将公布新的集团战略。自 2010 年以来，由于缺乏盈利增长以及两次增发（2020 年、2023 年），EDP 的股价表现一直落后于同行。GIR 讨论了几项可采取的措施：从低估值地区转型、在 EDPR 进行股票回购、保持资本支出纪律以及设定更高回报目标。过去也曾有关于简化集团结构（EDPR / EDP 合并）的讨论，以及媒体报道 Naturgy 的战略兴趣。
\*\* For more information, desk note (25- Jan): Minority buyouts: EDPR, Inwit, Getlink, JD Sport & 1&1, GIR (19- Aug): Upcoming CMD and the growth conundrum
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备注（1 月 25 日）：少数股权收购：EDPR、Inwit、Getlink、JD Sport 和 1&1，GIR（8 月 19 日）：即将举行的资本市场日与增长难题

7/ Vivendi litigation: The French appeals court is expected to make a ruling by the end of 2025 on whether Bollore SE controlled Vivendi at the time of the demerger & if it is required to launch a tender on the company. Vivendi shares trade at a \(30\%\) discount to NAV given the considerable uncertainty on both process & the price of a potential tender- offer.
7/ 维旺迪诉讼：法国上诉法院预计将在 2025 年底前就博洛雷集团（Bollore SE）在公司分拆时是否控制了维旺迪，以及是否需要对该公司发起要约收购作出裁决。由于在流程和潜在要约收购价格方面存在相当大的不确定性，维旺迪的股价较净资产价值（NAV）有 \(30\%\) 的折让交易。
\*\* For more information, desk note (18- Jul): Vivendi: Regulator orders a tender- offer \*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备忘（7 月 18 日）：维旺迪：监管机构下令发起要约收购

8/ Reckitt / Abbott NEC litigation: Next trials in the Multi- District Litigation ("MDL") are the "Brown vs. Abbott" case scheduled for 03- Nov 2025 & "Inman vs. Mead Johnson" scheduled for 02 Feb 2026. Pre- trial rulings could influence a potential settlement.
8/ 利洁时 / 雅培 NEC 诉讼：多地区诉讼（“MDL”）中的下一场审判为定于 2025 年 11 月 3 日的“Brown 诉 雅培”案，以及定于 2026 年 2 月 2 日的“Inman 诉 美赞臣”案。审前裁决可能会影响潜在的和解。
\*\* For more information, desk note (25- Sep 2024): Reckitt Benckiser | Litigation overhang
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备注（2024 年 9 月 25 日）：Reckitt Benckiser | 诉讼悬而未决

9/ Bayer glyphosate litigation: a decision from the US Solicitor General on whether the Supreme Court should review the Durnell case (Glyphosate) is expected in October / November. A subsequent ruling by the SCOTUS could come by summer 2026. In a recent note, GIR argued the stock could react \(+10 - 25\%\) on the announcement of a decision to review the case.
9/ 拜耳草甘膦诉讼：预计美国总统检察长将在10月/11月就最高法院是否应审理Durnell案（草甘膦）作出决定。最高法院随后可能在2026年夏季作出裁决。GIR在近期的一份报告中指出，如果宣布决定审理该案，股价可能会因此上涨 \(10 - 25\%\) 。

\*\* For more information, GIR (07-Aug): Pullback on numbers overdone, we continue to see positive risk/reward into 2H25 newsflow; (05-Jun) Risk/Reward looks positive into the end of 2025 - Upgrade to Buy
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅GIR（8月7日）：基于数据的回调过度，我们继续看好进入2025年下半年消息面的风险/回报；（6月5日）风险/回报在2025年底前看起来积极——评级上调至买入

10/ Copper M&A: on- going press this summer about possible large- scale M&A in the mining sector. We previously argued in June, that we expected to see a pick- up in large- scale copper M&A given the difficulty in bringing on new scale- projects (environmental concerns, regulatory complexity, labour shortages), the anticipated production decline at some of the majors (e.g. BHP), the raising cost of capex, low sector- multiples, the expected supply / demand deficit and the lack of early stage credible alternatives. Leadership changes at the majors, a potential catalyst. Rio holds a CMD on 04- Dec. GSXGCUMA Index & Rio Tinto DLC two plays of playing the theme.

10/ 铜矿并购：今年夏天媒体持续报道矿业领域可能出现的大规模并购。我们在6月份曾指出，由于新型项目推进困难（环境问题、监管复杂性、劳动力短缺）、部分大型矿企（如BHP）预期产量下降、资本支出成本上升、行业估值偏低、预期的供需缺口以及缺乏早期可信的替代项目，我们预计大型铜矿并购将有所增加。大型矿企的领导层变动可能成为催化剂。力拓将于12月4日举行资本市场日（CMD）。GSXGCUMA指数和力拓DLC是参与该主题的两种投资方式。
\*\* For more information, desk note (05- Jun): Copper M&A | Heading into the next M&A cycle? GS Copper M&A basket = GSXGCUMA Index; (19- Jun) Rio DLC | Catalysts that could affect the spread
\*\* 更多信息，请参阅交易台备忘录（6月5日）：铜并购 | 正进入下一个并购周期？GS铜并购篮子 = GSXGCUMA指数；（6月19日）Rio DLC | 可能影响价差的催化因素

And for 2026... Re- listings; Ashtead (£23bn) & Wise (£11bn) have both recently received shareholder approval to move their primary listing from the UK to the US in Q1 and Q2 2026 respectively. More recently, Dutch Insurer Aegon indicated that it was evaluating a relisting in the US - but the move could take "two to three years". AstraZeneca & Prysmian have also indicated their intention to review their listing venue.
至于2026年......重新上市；Ashtead（230亿英镑）和Wise（110亿英镑）最近均已获得股东批准，分别将在2026年第一季度和第二季度将其主要上市地从英国迁至美国。更近期，荷兰保险公司Aegon表示正在评估在美国重新上市的可能性——但此举可能需要“两到三年”时间。AstraZeneca和Prysmian也表示有意审查其上市地点。
Upcoming listingsCurrent listingProposed listing ASectorAshteadUKQ1Equipment rentalWiseUKQ2Multi-currency money-transfers
Previous high-profile European reistings

Prior ListingRe-listing dateSectorFergusonUKMay-22Building products distributionLindeGermanyFeb-23Industrial gasesCRHUK / IrelandSep-23Building materialsCNHIItaly / NLDec-23Agricultural equipmentFerrovialSpain / NLMay-24InfrastructureFlutterUK / IrelandMay-24GamingIndiviorUKJun-24Pharma

Source: GS Event Driven desk, Goldman Sachs FICC & Equities, as of 01 Sep 2026 - Past performance is not an indicator of future performance. CNHI omitted from charts as already had a US listing prior to the delisting in Europe
